languages.text: {n}Маражай окидывает ропщущую толпу взглядом из-под полуопущенных век. А затем негромко произносит:{/n} "Твои слуги перечат тебе, {name}. Прикажи мне преподать им урок. Сделать из одного зачинщика пример остальным".

{n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай окидывает ропщущую толпу взглядом из-под полуопущенных век. А затем негромко произносит:{/n} "Твои слуги перечат тебе, {name}. Прикажи мне преподать им урок. Сделать из одного зачинщика пример остальным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋目光半垂着，扫过骚动的人群，低声说道。{/n}“你的仆人对你不敬，{name}。请让我给领头的一个教训，杀一儆百。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋目光半垂着，扫过骚动的人群，低声说道。{/n}“你的仆人对你不敬，{name}。请让我给领头的一个教训，杀一儆百。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai echa un vistazo a la cuchicheante multitud sin dejar de entornar los ojos. Luego murmura:{/n} «Tus sirvientes desafían tu autoridad, {name}. Ordéname que les dé una lección. Elige a uno de los oficiales y haz que sirva como ejemplo para los demás».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai echa un vistazo a la cuchicheante multitud sin dejar de entornar los ojos. Luego murmura:{/n} «Tus sirvientes desafían tu autoridad, {name}. Ordéname que les dé una lección. Elige a uno de los oficiales y haz que sirva como ejemplo para los demás».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux mi-clos, Marazhai contemple la foule désapprobatrice avec dédain. Il murmure :{/n} « Vos serviteurs défient votre autorité, {name}. Ordonnez-moi de leur donner une bonne leçon. Choisissez l'un des meneurs, il fera office d'exemple. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux mi-clos, Marazhai contemple la foule désapprobatrice avec dédain. Il murmure :{/n} « Vos serviteurs défient votre autorité, {name}. Ordonnez-moi de leur donner une bonne leçon. Choisissez l'un des meneurs, il fera office d'exemple. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirft mit halb geschlossenen Lidern einen Blick auf die flüsternde Menge. Dann murmelt er:{/n} "Eure Diener widersetzen sich Euch, {name}. Gebt mir das Kommando, ihnen eine Lektion zu erteilen. Es muss ein Exempel an einem der Rädelsführer statuiert werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wirft mit halb geschlossenen Lidern einen Blick auf die flüsternde Menge. Dann murmelt er:{/n} "Eure Diener widersetzen sich Euch, {name}. Gebt mir das Kommando, ihnen eine Lektion zu erteilen. Es muss ein Exempel an einem der Rädelsführer statuiert werden."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、半眼でつぶやく群衆を一瞥した。そしてこうつぶやいた。{/n}「お前の従者どもはお前に逆らうらしい、{name}。俺に、奴らに教訓を与えるように命令しろ。そうすれば、首謀者の1人をみせしめにしてやるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、半眼でつぶやく群衆を一瞥した。そしてこうつぶやいた。{/n}「お前の従者どもはお前に逆らうらしい、{name}。俺に、奴らに教訓を与えるように命令しろ。そうすれば、首謀者の1人をみせしめにしてやるよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, mırıldanan kalabalığa kısık gözlerinin ardından bir bakış atıyor. Ardından mırıldanarak devam ediyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârların sana kafa tutuyor {name}. Bana onlara derslerini vermemi emret. Herkese ibret olsun diye elebaşlarından birini cezalandır."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance over the muttering crowd from beneath half-lidded eyes. Then he murmurs,{/n} "Your servants are defying you, {name}. Order me to teach them a lesson. Make one of the ringleaders an example for the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, mırıldanan kalabalığa kısık gözlerinin ardından bir bakış atıyor. Ardından mırıldanarak devam ediyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârların sana kafa tutuyor {name}. Bana onlara derslerini vermemi emret. Herkese ibret olsun diye elebaşlarından birini cezalandır."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
